<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

Help us *promote this project*, or simply *share it with your friends*.<br/>Feel free to use the text and images below :


=Short text presentation=

*Map icons collection* is a pack of 500 free icons for your placemarks. You can put them manually in your Google Maps with the "My maps" feature, or automaticly with the Google Maps API.<br>
Organized in color categories, you will get a complete collection of icons, such as cinema, school, bank, japanese restaurant and clothes store.

See the rest of the icons here : http://code.google.com/p/google-maps-icons/
